timerHelp:
§6§lHourglass §8| §7Assistance
§7/hourglass §8- §7Displays the current hourglass time
§7/hourglass pause §8- §7Drops the anchor
§7/hourglass resume §8- §7Hoists the anchor
§7/hourglass reset §8- §7Sets the hourglass back
§7/hourglass set <Sands> §8- §7Sets the hourglass to a specific time
§7/hourglass add <Sands> §8- §7Extends the hourglass by a certain time
§7/hourglass remove <Sands> §8- §7Shortens the hourglass by a certain time
§7/hourglass get §8- §7Displays the current hourglass time
§7/hourglass mode <Countdown/Countup> §8- §7Sets the hourglass mode
§7/hourglass firstColorSet <Color> §8- §7Sets the first color
§7/hourglass secondColorSet <Color> §8- §7Sets the second color
§7/hourglass bold <true/false> §8- §7Sets the bold value
backDescription: Click here to set sail back.
BedrockWallDescription: Hoists a wall o' bedrock that appears afta a few ticks behind ye
BedrockWallSecondsDescription: Seconds afore th' bedrock wall springs up behind ye
ChunkBreaksDownDescription: Th' top layer o' th' chunk be crumblin' away afta a spell
SecondsUntilChunkBreaksDownDescription: Seconds 'til th' chunk be reduced to bits
ElsaIceRadiusDescription: Th' span where th' ice be materializin'
EveryBlockDisappearsDescription: Every block ye lay yer hands on be vanishing' from th' entire chunk
EveryBlockDisappearsBlockPlaceDescriptio: Blocks disappear when ye put 'em down
EveryBlockDisappearsBlockDropPlaceDescri: Blocks drop their loot when shattered
EveryBlockDisappearsBlockDropBreakDescri: Blocks drop their loot when set down
RandomBlockDropsDescription: Every block ye aim to plunder yields a random treasure
RandomBlockDropsSaveDescription: Treasures be hoarded and be droppin' th' same treasure
TheFloorIsLavaDescription: All beneath ye transforms to molten lava after a tick
TheFloorIsLavaSecondsLavaDescription: Seconds 'til th' deck transforms to lava
TheFloorIsLavaSecondsMagmaDescription: Seconds 'til th' deck transforms to magma
YCoordinateOnlyInOneDirectionName: Y Coordinate Be Pointin' One Way
YCoordinateOnlyInOneDirectionDescription: Ye be sailin' only in a singular direction
